content.raw:
From Issue #74 we were only able to spawn using vitual\_stix.ign and not competition.ign, as below  

ign launch -v 4 virtual\_stix.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1\_SENSOR\_CONFIG\_1 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X2\_SENSOR\_CONFIG\_1 robotName3:=X3 robotConfig3:=X3\_SENSOR\_CONFIG\_1 robotName4:=X4 robotConfig4:=X4\_SENSOR\_CONFIG\_1

‌

otherwise we get the same blank window as @{557058:42fc2023-4935-4b2e-8079-075649866124}
content.html:
From Issue #74 we were only able to spawn using vitual_stix.ign and not competition.ign, as below

ign launch -v 4 virtual_stix.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName3:=X3 robotConfig3:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName4:=X4 robotConfig4:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_1

‌

otherwise we get the same blank window as @baila
